CmdLine: DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update   && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y     build-essential     curl     ruby     ruby-dev   && curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup | bash -   && apt-get install -y nodejs   && gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc     jekyll   && mkdir /src   && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get purge -y     build-essential     ruby-dev   && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get autoremove -y   && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get clean   && rm -Rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
